casebody.data:
FORD MOTOR COMPANY, Petitioner
v.
MONTANA EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT, et al. No. 19-368 Supreme Court of the United States. January 17, 2020 Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Montana and to the Supreme Court of Minnesota granted. The case is consolidated, and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
